precontractDisagree.title: We can not continue without your consent
precontractDisagree.detail: You are just a step away from your Savings account. In order to continue, we need your agreement to our pre-contractual information and signed dispositions. Do you have any questions? Let’s talk them through.

branch.title: We need more information from you, please stop by our branch

contractDisagree.title: We can not continue without your consent
contractDisagree.detail: You are just a step away from your Savings account. In order to continue, we need your agreement to our pre-contractual information and signed dispositions. Do you have any questions? Let’s talk them through.

scoring.title: We are sorry, something went wrong
scoring.detail: We can’t continue in the app but we will be happy to help you at one of our branches - please remember to take your ID with you.

api.title: We are sorry, something went wrong.
api.detail: We can’t continue right now, please try again later.

SCORING_UNAVAILABLE.title: Zzz…zzz….zzz
SCORING_UNAVAILABLE.detail:
At night, some of our systems are under maintenance and may not be available.

Please come back in an hour or two, when we are up and running.

PRECONTRACT_WAITING_FOR_OPEN_HOURS.title: This will take all night…
PRECONTRACT_WAITING_FOR_OPEN_HOURS.detail: Every night, our systems are under maintenance and may not be available. We can’t get your documents ready right now they will be ready at about 8 in the morning.Thank you for your patience.

CONTRACT_WAITING_FOR_OPEN_HOURS.title: This will take all night...
CONTRACT_WAITING_FOR_OPEN_HOURS.detail: Every night, our systems are under maintenance and may not be available. We can’t get your documents ready right now they will be ready at about 8 in the morning.Thank you for your patience.

general.supportChat: Just like in a branch – click here and our banker will be happy to help you via online chat.

helpPersonalDetail.title: Verify your details
helpPersonalDetail.detail: Let’s see if there have been any changes to your personal details. If so, you can verify them by uploading your personal ID in the following step. Just take a picture of within the app and it’s done. The process is secure. Do you have any questions? Let’s talk them through.

helpUploadDocument.title: We cannot continue without a currently valid form of ID
helpUploadDocument.detail: Since there have been changes to your personal details we need to verify them with a photo of your currently valid ID. The process is secure. Do you have any questions? Let’s talk them through.

helpOffer.title: Useful information
bullets: Get a premium interest rate by opening an account online here in Smart Banka, or on the internet via Internet Banka
Account maintenance and domestic transactions are free of charge
The money is available immediately and without a notice period
Manage your finances in Internet Banka and in the Smart Banka app — the best rated application on the market
In accordance with the law, your deposits are insured for up to EUR 100,000
Interest is credited monthly

helpOfferEUR.title: Useful information
bullets: Opening and maintaining a savings account in EUR for free.
Complete account access directly from your Internet Bank and Smart Bank.
Transfers between euro accounts within the EU and EEA for free.
Completely free electronic statements.
In accordance with the law, your deposits are insured for up to EUR 100,000
You can find more information about the savings account in EUR on our web.

redirectToCurrentAccount.title: To start saving, first open a foreign currency account in {currency}
redirectToCurrentAccount.detail: With it you will be able to easily transfer money to a savings account in {currency}.

documentUploadRetry.title: Oops, this is not going to work
documentUploadRetry.detail: We were not able to read all the data. Please make sure that the lighting is good and texts are clear and well-readable.

manualCheck.title: Your application needs to be reviewed, which may take a while.
manualCheck.detail: You can find the result here within 2 business days. Thank you for understanding.

scoringNok.title: After reviewing your application, we regret to inform you we can not offer you the account.
scoringNok.detail: For advice on further steps, please don’t hesitate to contact us.

documentUpload.title: We’re missing your current ID. You can upload them here.
documentUpload.detail: Some of your personal details have changed and we need to verify them. We need a clear and legible photo of your currently valid identity card. You can take it within the app. The process is secure.

uploadedDocument.title: Please take a photo of both sides of your identity card.
labels:

your identity card.

your identity card.

bullets: Interest rate for up to CZK 1,000,000 is guaranteed until September 30, 2025
savingsOfferDpsCrossSell.caption: More information at www.moneta.cz

crossSellSection.title: You can get 19.7 % appreciation from a part of your deposit if you apply for Pension Savings
bullets: Don't forget to apply for Pension Savings after completing your Savings Account application.
Deposit CZK 20,000 yearly from your savings account and thanks to state subsidy of CZK 2,660 and tax relief of CZK 1,199 yearly you get a 19.7 % appreciation.
It is enough to deposit a part of your funds from your Savings Account.

savingsOfferTiersBySalesProdType.title:
GREAT OFFER FOR ACTIVE CUSTOMERS
Savings account with an interest rate of up to 5.0 % p. a. with no limit on the amount of the deposit
savingsOfferTiersBySalesProdType.body: Appreciation of 5.0 % per year with no limit on the amount of the deposit
bullets: 5.0 % p.a . appreciation for active use of the current account. We guarantee basic rate of 4.6 % per year until June 2, 2024
To get a rate of 5.0% p. a., it is enough if you have income of at least CZK 15,000 per month in your current account and you pay 10 times with a credit card.
Unlimited deposit amount
No fees. As you are used to with us
Opening an account online in no time

identification.title: Is this your first and last name?
identification.taxResidenceInfoBody: We kindly ask you for information in order to meet Global standards for the exchange of information provided by financial institutions for tax authorities under the Multilateral Agreement by competent authorities for the automatic exchange of information about financial accounts (including current and saving bank account or term deposit).

staticDocuments.title: Learn important contract documents
staticDocuments.subtitle: You can find all documents in the My Documents section of Smart Banka.
staticDocuments.primaryButton: I confirm that I have read the documents

contract.title: Carefully read the dispositions and special clauses

victory.title: Your savings account is ready
victory.detail: All documents can be found in Smart Banka and Internet Banka in the My Documents section.

victoryEUR.title: Done, you can start saving
victoryEUR.detail: You can exchange money from your koruna account for euros in our online exchange office. And immediately afterwards you can transfer it to savings.

victoryWithDPS.title: Your savings account is ready
victoryWithDPS.detail: You can get 19,7 % appreciation from a part of your deposit if you apply for Pension Savings

bullets.title: You already have a savings account.  ✅
Apply for Pension Savings in Smart Banka.
Deposit 20 000 Kč yearly from your savings account and thanks to state subsidy of 2 760 Kč and tax relief of 1 199 Kč yearly you get a 19,7 % appreciation.
For a part of your deposit you get the greatest appreciation.

tomorrowVictory.title: Your savings account will be ready in the morning of the following business day.
tomorrowVictory.detail: All documents can be found in Smart Banka and Internet Banka in the My Documents section.

delayedVictory.title: It’s almost done, but the signature might take moment.
delayedVictory.detail:
It might take us a moment to sign the document - a couple of hours during business day, and during weekends it will take until Monday. Your account will be ready then. All documents can already be found in Smart Banka and Internet Banka in the My Documents section. 

Our apologies, we appreciate your patience.

scoring.title: Just a moment, the cat needs to look it over.

waitingBeforeContract.title: Just a minute, we’re preparing your contract

signByUs.title: Now its our turn to sign the contract

sign.title: Sign the dispositions and special clauses with your PIN:

simpleDocumentUpload.title: Oops, we need your current ID card.
simpleDocumentUpload.detail: It seems that the ID card you have provided is no longer valid. Please upload your new and valid ID card.

141.title: ID card
141.detail: Since your last visit, some information seems to have changed.

photoCapture.title: Take a photo of the front side of your ID card
photoCapture.detail: It must be valid, well-lit and legible.

photoCapture.title: Take a photo of the rear side of your ID card
photoCapture.detail: It must be valid, well-lit and legible.

busyLoader.title: Reviewing the information, just a second.
busyLoader.detail: This should only take a moment.

uploadDocumentResultNok.title: We are unable to open savings account for your at this moment

uploadDocumentResultUploadAgain.title: Oops, this did not work out.
uploadDocumentResultUploadAgain.detail: Try taking the photo again, and make sure it's well-lit, clear and legible.

review.title: Great photo! Is this information correct?

personalData.title: Your information will be verified in the basic registers. You can find out more about register on the website of Basic Registers Management and Moneta . By clicking Continue, you confirm that all provided information is factual, complete, correct, and up-to-date.
